dimension: 20 1/2 x 11 3/16 x 1 7/16 in. (52.07 x 28.42 x 3.65 cm) (including pendants)
title: Silver Ornament
description: hollow ring of thin silver sheets, hammered on one side with dragons and moths; hanging pendants with moths, fish and other designs, bells, tubular beads and teardrop shapes
creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
